# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Captain
The Captain is the head of the station. They are expected to oversee the station, and ensure that the station is running smoothly. A well run station means the Captain shouldn't have to do much, but a good Captain should be prepared to fulfil any role that is needed. The most important thing is to secure the Nuclear Disk, however.
## Do - Secure the Nuclear Disk at ALL times. - Ensure the station is running smoothly. - Have knowledge of every department on the station in the event that a department is in need of assistance. - Protect Hamlet.
## Don't - Abuse your authority. - Interfere in departments when it's not needed. - Give out All Access (AA) to just anyone.
